ModMetaData.name: Range Finder
ModMetaData.author: Andreas Pardeike
ModMetaData.description:
Constantly checking the shooting range of your colonists/turrets? Range Finder makes it easy.
Just select one or more colonists/turrets and press the hotkey (Ctrl by default). When you quickly press the key twice the range will be shown until you press the key later again.
